dict.acceptation: 生长；渐渐变得；逐渐开始；

sent.orig: The program is developed with GROW workbench and object-oriented language at last.
sent.trans: 最后应用GROW平台和面向对象的开发语言，分别编程进行实现。

sent.orig: Run Advisors on your account and watch your investment GROW AND GROW AND GROW!
sent.trans: 在你的个人账户运行软件你就只需要看着你的投资增长增长增长！

sent.orig: A crowd of children disporting are running about around grow-ups, which caused grow-ups' scold.
sent.trans: 一群嬉戏玩耍的孩子，始终围着大人们追来跑去，短不了惹得人们骂上几句。

sent.orig: Every blade of grass has its angel that bends over it and whispers, grow, grow.
sent.trans: 每一片叶子都有自己的天使弯下身子对它低语：长大，快长大。

sent.orig: When you grow quickly, but not too quickly you have a chance grow, modify, and adapt.
sent.trans: 处于快速增长而又不是太快的时候，你还有机会来调整、适应、成长。
